none: Bed Bugs - Mentone Beach Patrol demo
Bed Bugs - Mentone Beach Patrol demo

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on August 24, 2016 Description from Terminal Escape:
You know this shit by now, right? I mean, you totally should. These freeks just level the joint with six tracks of killer, bombastic hardcore punk. It's what you want, it's what you need. Everyday everyday everyday everyday.... MENTONE BEACH PATROL
